subject: New York City Marathon
Running
Waste Materials and Disposal
lead_paragraph: The 39,085 runners who started Sunday’s race left a surreal amount of garbage and treasure behind, but hundreds of volunteers and sanitation workers were standing by to swoop in.
snippet: The 39,085 runners who started Sunday’s race left a surreal amount of garbage and treasure behind, but hundreds of volunteers and sanitation workers were standing by to swoop in.
